sentences.en: Boys or girls may be embarrassed by adolescent problems in coeducation schools.
sentences.cn: 当男女同校时,男孩或女孩可能会为一些青春问题而感到尴尬.

sentences.en: Coeducation gives kids the opportunity of growing in an atmosphere of diversity.
sentences.cn: 男女同校为孩子提供了一种丰富多彩的成长环境.

sentences.en: Coeducation is very common in North America.
sentences.cn: 男女同校的现象在北美非常普遍.

sentences.en: Do you think coeducation is a good model?
sentences.cn: 你认为男女同校这种模式好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Ever the innovator, Kemeny served as president of Dartmouth, 1970-81, introducing coeducation to the school in 1972 after more than two centuries of all-male enrollment.
sentences.cn: Kemeny任何时候都是改革者，他于1970-81年担任达特茅斯的校长，在两个多世纪都是男性注册入学之后，1972年在这间学校推行男女同校。

sentences.en: It is true that a majority of faculty members voted in favor of coeducation, arguing that it would encourage more students to apply to Grove.
sentences.cn: 确实有大部分员工投票赞成男女同校，认为这会使更多的学生申请Grove。

sentences.en: Laws were enacted to distinguish illegitimate children, the right for a woman to have an abortion was abolished, divorce became as difficult as ever, and coeducation was no longer offered.
sentences.cn: 他制定了法律来区分私生子，女性堕胎的权利被剥夺了，离婚像以前一样变得困难，男女也不能同校。

sentences.en: My mother wants me to go to an all - girls school because she is against coeducation.
sentences.cn: 我母亲反对男女同校,想让我去女子学校读书.

trans.tran_en: a system in which students of both sexes are educated together
